SECTION.name: EMV CONTACT
SECTION.description: list of tags used for EMV contact

tag.Name: Account Type
tag.description: Indicates the type of account selected on the terminal

tag.Name: Acquirer Identifier
tag.description: Uniquely identifies the acquirer within each payment system

tag.Name: Additional Terminal Capabilities
tag.description: Indicates the data input and output capabilities of the terminal

tag.Name: Amount, Authorised (Binary)
tag.description: Authorised amount of the transaction (excluding adjustments)

tag.Name: Amount, Authorised (Numeric)
tag.description: Authorised amount of the transaction (excluding adjustments)

tag.Name: Amount, Other (Binary)
tag.description: Secondary amount associated with the transaction representing a cashback amount

tag.Name: Amount, Other (Numeric)
tag.description: Secondary amount associated with the transaction representing a cashback amount

tag.Name: Amount, Reference Currency
tag.description: Authorised amount expressed in the reference currency

tag.Name: Application Cryptogram
tag.description: Cryptogram returned by the ICC in response of the GENERATE AC command

tag.Name: Application Currency Code
tag.description: Indicates the currency in which the account is managed according to ISO 4217

tag.Name: Application Currency Exponent
tag.description: Indicates the implied position of the decimal point from the right of the amount represented according to ISO 4217

tag.Name: Application Discretionary Data
tag.description: Issuer or payment system specified data relating to the application

tag.Name: Application Effective Date
tag.description: Date from which the application may be used

tag.Name: Application Expiration Date
tag.description: Date after which application expires

tag.Name: Application File Locator (AFL)
tag.description: Indicates the location (SFI, range of records) of the AEFs related to a given application

tag.Name: Application Dedicated File (ADF) Name
tag.description: Identifies the application as described in ISO/IEC 7816-5

tag.Name: Application Identifier (AID) terminal
tag.description: Identifies the application as described in ISO/IEC 7816-5

tag.Name: Application Interchange Profile
tag.description: Indicates the capabilities of the card to support specific functions in the application

item.information: Terminal Risk Management is to be performed

tag.Name: Application Label
tag.description: Mnemonic associated with the AID according to ISO/IEC 7816-5
tag.Format: ans with the special character limited to space

tag.Name: Application Preferred Name
tag.description: Preferred mnemonic associated with the AID

tag.Name: Application Primary Account Number (PAN)
tag.description: Valid cardholder account number

tag.Name: Application Primary Account Number (PAN) Sequence Number
tag.description: Identifies and differentiates cards with the same PAN

tag.Name: Application Priority Indicator
tag.description: Indicates the priority of a given application or group of applications in a directory

tag.Name: Application Reference Currency
tag.description: 1-4 currency codes used between the terminal and the ICC when the Transaction Currency Code is different from the Application Currency Code; each code is 3 digits according to ISO 4217

tag.Name: Application Reference Currency Exponent
tag.description: Indicates the implied position of the decimal point from the right of the amount, for each of the 1-4 reference currencies represented according to ISO 4217

tag.Name: Application Template
tag.description: Contains one or more data objects relevant to an application directory entry according to ISO/IEC 7816-5

tag.Name: Application Transaction Counter (ATC)
tag.description: Counter maintained by the application in the ICC (incrementing the ATC is managed by the ICC)

tag.Name: Application Usage Control
tag.description: Indicates issuers specified restrictions on the geographic usage and services allowed for the application

item.information: Valid at terminals other than ATMs

tag.Name: Application Version Number
tag.description: Version number assigned by the payment system for the application

tag.Name: Application Version Number
tag.description: Version number assigned by the payment system for the application

tag.Name: Authorisation Code
tag.description: Value generated by the authorisation authority for an approved transaction
tag.Format: As defined by the Payment Systems

tag.Name: Authorisation Response Code
tag.description: Code that defines the disposition of a message

tag.Name: Bank Identifier Code (BIC)
tag.description: Uniquely identifies a bank as defined in ISO 9362.

tag.Name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 1 (CDOL1)
tag.description: List of data objects (tag and length) to be passed to the ICC in the first GENERATE AC command

tag.Name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 2 (CDOL2)
tag.description: List of data objects (tag and length) to be passed to the ICC in the second GENERATE AC command

tag.Name: Cardholder Name
tag.description: Indicates cardholder name according to ISO 7813

tag.Name: Cardholder Name Extended
tag.description: Indicates the whole cardholder name when greater than 26 characters using the same coding convention as in ISO 7813

tag.Name: Cardholder Verification Method (CVM) List
tag.description: Identifies a method of verification of the cardholder supported by the application

tag.Name: Cardholder Verification Method (CVM) Results
tag.description: Indicates the results of the last CVM performed

item.information: Valid at terminals other than ATMs

tag.Name: Certification Authority Public Key Index
tag.description: Identifies the certification authoritys public key in conjunction with the RID

tag.Name: Certification Authority Public Key Index
tag.description: Identifies the certification authoritys public key in conjunction with the RID

tag.Name: Command Template
tag.description: Identifies the data field of a command message

tag.Name: Cryptogram Information Data
tag.description: Indicates the type of cryptogram and the actions to be performed by the terminal

tag.Name: Data Authentication Code
tag.description: An issuer assigned value that is retained by the terminal during the verification process of the Signed Static Application Data

tag.Name: Dedicated File (DF) Name
tag.description: Identifies the name of the DF as described in ISO/IEC 7816-4

tag.Name: Directory Definition File (DDF) Name
tag.description: Identifies the name of a DF associated with a directory

tag.Name: Directory Discretionary Template
tag.description: Issuer discretionary part of the directory according to ISO/IEC 7816-5

tag.Name: Dynamic Data Authentication Data Object List (DDOL)
tag.description: List of data objects (tag and length) to be passed to the ICC in the INTERNAL AUTHENTICATE command

tag.Name: File Control Information (FCI) Issuer Discretionary Data
tag.description: Issuer discretionary part of the FCI

tag.Name: File Control Information (FCI) Proprietary Template
tag.description: Identifies the data object proprietary to this specification in the FCI template according to ISO/IEC 7816-4

tag.Name: File Control Information (FCI) Template
tag.description: Identifies the FCI template according to ISO/IEC 7816-4

tag.Name: ICC Dynamic Number
tag.description: Time-variant number generated by the ICC, to be captured by the terminal

tag.Name: Integrated Circuit Card (ICC) PIN Encipherment Public Key Certificate
tag.description: ICC PIN Encipherment Public Key certified by the issuer

tag.Name: Integrated Circuit Card (ICC) PIN Encipherment Public Key Exponent
tag.description: ICC PIN Encipherment Public Key Exponent used for PIN encipherment

tag.Name: Integrated Circuit Card (ICC) PIN Encipherment Public Key Remainder
tag.description: Remaining digits of the ICC PIN Encipherment Public Key Modulus

tag.Name: Integrated Circuit Card (ICC) Public Key Certificate
tag.description: ICC Public Key certified by the issuer

tag.Name: Integrated Circuit Card (ICC) Public Key Exponent
tag.description: ICC Public Key Exponent used for the verification of the Signed Dynamic Application Data

tag.Name: Integrated Circuit Card (ICC) Public Key Remainder
tag.description: Remaining digits of the ICC Public Key Modulus

tag.Name: Interface Device (IFD) Serial Number
tag.description: Unique and permanent serial number assigned to the IFD by the manufacturer

tag.Name: International Bank Account Number (IBAN)
tag.description: Uniquely identifies the account of a customer at a financial institution as defined in ISO 13616

tag.Name: Issuer Action Code - Default
tag.description: Specifies the issuers conditions that cause a transaction to be rejected if it might have been approved online, but the terminal is unable to process the transaction online

tag.Name: Issuer Action Code - Denial
tag.description: Specifies the issuers conditions that cause the denial of a transaction without attempt to go online

tag.Name: Issuer Action Code - Online
tag.description: Specifies the issuers conditions that cause a transaction to be transmitted online

tag.Name: Issuer Application Data
tag.description: Contains proprietary application data for transmission to the issuer in an online transaction

tag.Name: Issuer Authentication Data
tag.description: Data sent to the ICC for online issuer authentication

tag.Name: Issuer Code Table Index
tag.description: Indicates the code table according to ISO/IEC 8859 for displaying the Application Preferred Name

tag.Name: Issuer Country Code
tag.description: Indicates the country of the issuer according to ISO 3166

tag.Name: Issuer Country Code (alpha2 format)
tag.description: Indicates the country of the issuer as defined in ISO 3166 (using a 2 character alphabetic code)

tag.Name: Issuer Country Code (alpha3 format)
tag.description: Indicates the country of the issuer as defined in ISO 3166 (using a 3 character alphabetic code)

tag.Name: Issuer Identification Number (IIN)
tag.description: The number that identifies the major industry and the card issuer and that forms the first part of the Primary Account Number (PAN)

tag.Name: Issuer Public Key Certificate
tag.description: Issuer public key certified by a certification authority

tag.Name: Issuer Public Key Exponent
tag.description: Issuer public key exponent used for the verification of the Signed Static Application Data and the ICC Public Key Certificate

tag.Name: Issuer Public Key Remainder
tag.description: Remaining digits of the Issuer Public Key Modulus

tag.Name: Issuer Script Command
tag.description: Contains a command for transmission to the ICC

tag.Name: Issuer Script Identifier
tag.description: Identification of the Issuer Script

tag.Name: Issuer Script Template 1
tag.description: Contains proprietary issuer data for transmission to the ICC before the second GENERATE AC command

tag.Name: Issuer Script Template 2
tag.description: Contains proprietary issuer data for transmission to the ICC after the second GENERATE AC command

tag.Name: Issuer URL
tag.description: The URL provides the location of the Issuers Library Server on the Internet

tag.Name: Language Preference
tag.description: 1-4 languages stored in order of preference, each represented by 2 alphabetical characters according to ISO 639

tag.Name: Last Online Application Transaction Counter (ATC) Register
tag.description: ATC value of the last transaction that went online

tag.Name: Log Entry
tag.description: Provides the SFI of the Transaction Log file and its number of records

tag.Name: Log Format
tag.description: List (in tag and length format) of data objects representing the logged data elements that are passed to the terminal when a transaction log record is read

tag.Name: Lower Consecutive Offline Limit
tag.description: Issuer-specified preference for the maximum number of consecutive offline transactions for this ICC application allowed in a terminal with online capability

tag.Name: Merchant Category Code
tag.description: Classifies the type of business being done by the merchant, represented according to ISO 8583:1993 for Card Acceptor Business Code

tag.Name: Merchant Identifier
tag.description: When concatenated with the Acquirer Identifier, uniquely identifies a given merchant

tag.Name: Merchant Name and Location
tag.description: Indicates the name and location of the merchant

tag.Name: Personal Identification Number (PIN) Try Counter
tag.description: Number of PIN tries remaining

tag.Name: Point-of-Service (POS) Entry Mode
tag.description: Indicates the method by which the PAN was entered, according to the first two digits of the ISO 8583:1987 POS Entry Mode

tag.Name: Processing Options Data Object List (PDOL)
tag.description: Contains a list of terminal resident data objects (tags and lengths) needed by the ICC in processing the GET PROCESSING OPTIONS command

tag.Name: READ RECORD Response Message Template
tag.description: Contains the contents of the record read. (Mandatory for SFIs 1-10. Response messages for SFIs 11-30 are outside the scope of EMV, but may use template '70')

tag.Name: Response Message Template Format 1
tag.description: Contains the data objects (without tags and lengths) returned by the ICC in response to a command

tag.Name: Response Message Template Format 2
tag.description: Contains the data objects (with tags and lengths) returned by the ICC in response to a command

tag.Name: Service Code
tag.description: Service code as defined in ISO/IEC 7813 for track 1 and track 2

tag.Name: Short File Identifier (SFI)
tag.description: Identifies the AEF referenced in commands related to a given ADF or DDF. It is a binary data object having a value in the range 1 to 30 and with the three high order bits set to zero.

tag.Name: Signed Dynamic Application Data
tag.description: Digital signature on critical application parameters for DDA or CDA

tag.Name: Signed Static Application Data
tag.description: Digital signature on critical application parameters for SDA

tag.Name: Static Data Authentication Tag List
tag.description: List of tags of primitive data objects defined in this specification whose value fields are to be included in the Signed Static or Dynamic Application Data

tag.Name: Terminal Capabilities
tag.description: Indicates the card data input, CVM, and security capabilities of the terminal

tag.Name: Terminal Country Code
tag.description: Indicates the country of the terminal, represented according to ISO 3166

tag.Name: Terminal Floor Limit
tag.description: Indicates the floor limit in the terminal in conjunction with the AID

tag.Name: Terminal Identification
tag.description: Designates the unique location of a terminal at a merchant

tag.Name: Terminal Risk Management Data
tag.description: Application-specific value used by the card for risk management purposes

tag.Name: Terminal Type
tag.description: Indicates the environment of the terminal, its communications capability, and its operational control

tag.Name: Terminal Verification Results
tag.description: Status of the different functions as seen from the terminal

item.information: Offline data authentication was not performed
Card appears on terminal exception file
ICC and terminal have different application versions
Requested service not allowed for card product
PIN entry required and PIN pad not present or not working
PIN entry required, PIN pad present, but PIN was not entered
Transaction selected randomly for online processing
Script processing failed before final GENERATE AC
Script processing failed before final GENERATE AC

tag.Name: Track 1 Discretionary Data
tag.description: Discretionary part of track 1 according to ISO/IEC 7813

tag.Name: Track 2 Discretionary Data
tag.description: Discretionary part of track 2 according to ISO/IEC 7813

tag.Name: Track 2 Equivalent Data
tag.description: Contains the data elements of track 2 according to ISO/IEC 7813, excluding start sentinel, end sentinel, and Longitudinal

tag.Name: Transaction Certificate Data Object List (TDOL)
tag.description: List of data objects (tag and length) to be used by the terminal in generating the TC Hash Value

tag.Name: Transaction Certificate (TC) Hash Value
tag.description: Result of a hash function

tag.Name: Transaction Currency Code
tag.description: Indicates the currency code of the transaction according to ISO 4217

tag.Name: Transaction Currency Exponent
tag.description: Indicates the implied position of the decimal point from the right of the transaction amount represented according to ISO 4217

tag.Name: Transaction Date
tag.description: Local date that the transaction was authorised

tag.Name: Transaction Personal Identification Number (PIN) Data
tag.description: Data entered by the cardholder for the purpose of the PIN verification

tag.Name: Transaction Reference Currency Code
tag.description: Code defining the common currency used by the terminal in case the Transaction Currency Code is different from the Application Currency Code

tag.Name: Transaction Reference Currency Exponent
tag.description: Indicates the implied position of the decimal point from the right of the transaction amount, with the Transaction Reference Currency Code represented according to ISO 4217

tag.Name: Transaction Sequence Counter
tag.description: Counter maintained by the terminal that is incremented by one for each transaction

tag.Name: Transaction Status Information
tag.description: Indicates the functions performed in a transaction

tag.Name: Transaction Time
tag.description: Local time that the transaction was authorised

tag.Name: Transaction Type
tag.description: Indicates the type of financial transaction, represented by the first two digits of the ISO 8583:1987 Processing Code

tag.Name: Unpredictable Number
tag.description: Value to provide variability and uniqueness to the generation of a cryptogram

tag.Name: Upper Consecutive Offline Limit
tag.description: Issuer-specified preference for the maximum number of consecutive offline transactions for this ICC application allowed in a terminal without online capability

SECTION.name: EMV CONTACTLESS
SECTION.description: list of tags used for contactless

SECTION.name: RETAIL
SECTION.description: list of tags used for retail
